attributes.action: Instruct MP’s to behave like adults in Parliament and actually answer questions.
attributes.additional_details: These people are meant to be running our country. The Speaker needs to take control of the MP’s and the house needs to take some pride in what they do. No more jeering and abuse. Answer the questions and no more insulting each other. It is, quite frankly, immature, embarrassing to the people of the country, and pathetic.
attributes.background: Parliament has become an embarrassment - name calling and insults instead of properly debating matters. People in power acting like children and refusing to answer actual questions. I would like MP’s to be made to grow up and actually act like adults (especially in PM’s question time)

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament as a whole aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Order in the Commons is the responsibility of the Speaker personally.
